query-mapping.description: Queries used by the tags module

query.name: check-tag
query.comment: Check and get the tag identifier associated with a given tag and entity
query.sql: SELECT t.id, e.id FROM awa_tags AS t LEFT JOIN awa_tagged_entity AS e ON t.id = e.tag_id AND e.entity_type = :entity_type AND e.entity_id = :entity_id WHERE t.name = :tag
